productName: Memory Sync Round 7 — JBCCCI Seminar, VSTECS Partnership, MyHackathon, Startup Ecosystem & Side Ventures
overview: Extract facts from Jay's Notion workspace covering JBCCCI I4.0 Seminar organization, VSTECS/AWS partnership and POC grants, MyHackathon 2024 competition, CRADLE/MPMA networking events, Zeta Technology project, PetiKembara luggage business, Prisma business agreements, Farm Fresh and uncaptured sales leads, AI-LiveChat SaaS product, and Prisma digital marketing strategy. Push atomic memories to Mem0 Cloud (api.mem0.ai). No code changes — purely API operations.
goals: Document JBCCCI Industrial 4.0 Seminar event organization and outcomes
Capture VSTECS partnership, AWS POC grant applications, and APN registration
Record MyHackathon 2024 participation and team composition
Map CRADLE startup roadshow and MPMA networking events
Document Zeta Technology AWS migration project
Capture PetiKembara luggage livestream business venture
Record Prisma business agreements (P&C, Chong-Eddie, Foodpanda, StoreHub)
Document Farm Fresh and other uncaptured Prisma sales pipeline leads
Capture AI-LiveChat SaaS product details and domain setup
Each fact is atomic: one subject, one predicate, retrievable via semantic search

userStories.title: JBCCCI Industrial 4.0 Seminar Organization (Aug 2023)
userStories.description: Fetch JBCCCI I4.0 Seminar task pages, emcee schedule, event brief, MIDF invitation letter, seminar process flow, sponsor voucher package. Extract: event date/venue, Jay as emcee, speakers (Teddy, Yang, Chong prompt engineering), MIDF invitation, Paragon International School venue, committee task assignments.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch seminar task pages, emcee schedule, event brief, invitation letters
Extract: event details, speakers, Jay's emcee role, venue, sponsors
Push 8-10 atomic facts about JBCCCI I4.0 seminar
Verify via Mem0 search for 'JBCCCI seminar' and 'Industrial 4.0 seminar'
notionSearchQueries: jbccci seminar process flow 讲座流程
